main event: On June 6, 1966, a bright, elongated light, estimated to be about 50 feet long and 10 feet wide, was observed moving in a zig-zag pattern in the night sky over Ligao, Philippines.
interesting points: The object appeared stationary for several minutes before accelerating away at high speed,The sighting was reported around 2100 hours,The weather was clear at the time of the observation,The witness, Mrs. Maria Cloribel, was deemed highly reliable,The sighting involved at least four independent witnesses, including a local police officer.
sighted object: a bright elongated light in the sky
witness description: Mrs. Maria Cloribel and three other witnesses including a local police officer.
